page.title: 17TRADE & SERVICES 2
page.content: Savings Bank in Lochgilphead. Doctor-Lochgiphead. Hospital-Mid Argyll,West Highland, Vale of Leven,Alexandria. Dentist-School dental unit comes to school each year. Some go to dentists in Lochgilphead & Oban. Emergency services- Ambulance,fire, police based all in Lochgilphead. Swimming pool-Ardrishaig, available for evening group bookings,public pools at Oban & Campbeltown. Sport-Sports Centre, Lochgilphead. Electricity-Cruachan Power Station. Television reception-Some people receive from N.Ireland and others from Mull Transmitters. Cinemas-Lochgilphead closed this year but the nearest is Oban.
